fields.summary: Windows: Window.fullscreen on Windows 10 doesn't work

comments.body:
Verified as fixed, {{Ti.UI.Window.fullscreen}} now works correctly with Windows 10 devices. tested with both {{true}} & {{false}}.

Tested on: 
Windows 10 Pro 
Windows Phone 10.0 & 8.1 (Microsoft Lumia 640 LTE) 
Appc Studio: 4.6.0.201604141457
Ti SDK: 5.3.0.v20160414094426
Appc NPM: 4.2.5-1 
Appc Core: 5.3.0-12 
Node: v4.4.2

*Closing Ticket.*
